This game is really fun, I've poured many great hours in it. But it is PLAGUED by bugs. Game breaking bugs that alter the way to play. It has been this way for nearly FOUR years and they'll probably never fix those. I willl not recommend this game until the bugs are fixed, this needs to change.

Ce jeu n'est pas tellement mieux que l'original et il n'exploite pas du tout les possibilités du moteur source. Valve a probablement du le commercialiser en pensant que la communauté se chargerait de créer des maps, mais la communauté est restée sur le jeu original et Les serveurs sont vides. Bref, il n'a aucun intéret. en fait ce jeu devrait être gratuit.

Рекомендую всем любителям Half-Life, которые периодически испытывают ностальгию по тем замечательным часам, что провели в её мире. Ботов нет, на серверах только игроки, кто поопытнее, а кто совсем зеленый. Но, как говорится, зелеными были все, и даже те, кто сейчас не знает себе равных. Если игрок настроен разгадать тактику других, учиться у сильнейших и первое время, разумеется терпеть многократные, чего скрывать, поражения, чтож - эта игра для Вас! Терпение окупится сторицей: Вас будут обвинять в читерстве слабые игроки - те кто не понимает, как играть в HLDMS оставаясь не побежденным десятки минут. Успехов и удачи, думаю непременно увидимся на приятных картах.
An Instant Classic!
No

As far as free Multiplayer add ons go this is great and a whole lotta fun

Pros
From what I've played there seems to be quite a lively community of players for this game still 
This is some really fun old fashioned run and gun Death match action 
I don't typically play online games that often but I still had plenty of fun and even ended up winning a few matches 
There's plenty of maps to play on and no match was exactly the same

Cons 
I'm not sure if that much effort was put into balancing this and it may have just been released to add multiplayer for the sake of having multiplayer for instance a few weapons feel a bit OP like the shotgun and rocket launcher but even if this is the case the game's still super fun 

So yeah this is a pretty basic multiplayer add on but still super fun and I'd definitely recommend checking it out

Al igual que todos los juegos viejos de valve (con excepcion del Counter Strike 1 (version actual 1.6) este es un juego casi muerto en lo que respecta al multiplayer.
Particularmente esta es la contracara del half Life: Source, en su adaptacion al motor grafico, pero para deathmatch (multiplayer).

El juego es sencillo de jugar, es lo mismo que siempre, no hay innovaciones mas alla del motor grafico, el juego posee casi 11 años asi que Corre perfecto en cualquier computadora en maximos graficos sin mayores complicaciones.

Consume poco espacio y recursos asi que aun en ordenadores viejos va a poder jugarse.

En lo negativo, Es un juego que esta CASI totalmente muerto igual que el Deathmatch classic, Son los 2 juegos mas muertos de Valve, los dos tienen menos de 10/12 servidores activos en todo momento, con practicamente 0 gente jugando en todos o 2 a 8 jugadores, pero de Paises tan lejanos como Japon o Rusia donde practicamente el Ping los hace injugables a menos que tengas un internet con Muy buena salida internacional, en cuyo caso vas a poder al menos disfrutar de partidas con pequeñas cantidades de jugadores pero no esperes mas que eso.

El juego viene en Pack con el Half Life Source, los cuales por 7,49$ estan a un precio bastante aceptable por lo que representa el half life 1 en su modo historia, No obstante el Multiplayer este no lo justifica.

Mi consejo es que si esta interesado en adquirir los productos de valve, compre el pack completo que sale como unos 70 y tantos dolares o espere a que este en rebaja y comprelo, tendra todos los juegos y podra disfrutarlos a un bajo precio, de otra manera, hay juegos como este, que literalmente no justifican comprarlos por si solos por que no hay con quien jugar y tampoco cuestan tan baratos, ya que por menos de 5 dolares, hay juegos geniales en rebajas que tienen mucho mas futuro que este.

Half-Life Deathmatch: Source isn't great but it isn't horrible either, Its just okay.
The servers aren't entirely dead yet but it's pretty close. Fun.

People still are playing online to this day anf that's pretty impressive. I stopped in for a few games and surprisingly the highest ping I saw was 200, so the games were playing perfectly for the most part. I like the larger maps a lot, it's what makes me come back to this game. The sequal is great but it lacks that oldschool Halo 1 feeling that the original has. There are also some really good weapons in this game that are not in the second, which causes some balancing differences. I feel like the first game is a little more balanced, and the maps are also. I prefer to find myself not feeling left out in the open or dying at spawn which this game has none of. I wish all of these maps were ported to Counter Strike Source for both deathmatches and bomb games.

Half-Life Deathmatch: Source is a multiplayer FPS game. The game is using the ''Source'' engine. (Same engine as CSS, Half life 2 & etc.)

The game is dead but if you do find server with players it is VERY VERY fun.

Pros-
Fun gameplay
Large amount of weapons
No 9 years old kids that swear on their mic

Cons-
The game is dead.
The graphics are bad and doesn't fit with the ''Source'' engine
You can't change your player model

I personally think this game is more fun than Counter-Strike Global-Offensive (when played with other players) because there are not ''Toxic Russians'' in the game. ( I am not saying that Half-Life Deathmatch: Source is better than Counter-Strike Global-Offensive ) But i don't reccomend you this game because it is dead and it is low chance to find server with more than 7 pleyers. 

If you want to play Half life 1 deathmatch just buy the original. It has single & multi player and it has more servers with actual players and it is less glitchy.

This is my personal opinion don't hate on me please !

If I missed something or made a mistake in the review please reply without hate speech !
